statements: UPDATE website_traffic_analysis SET page_views = 500 WHERE website_id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_analysis SET conversion_rate = 0.05, date_visited = '2022-01-15' WHERE website_id = 2;
UPDATE website_traffic_analysis SET page_views = 1000, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE website_id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_analysis SET conversion_rate = 0.1, traffic_source = 'Google' WHERE website_id = 2;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_url='example.com/page1', visit_timestamp='2022-03-10 08:00:00' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate=3.75, conversion_timestamp='2022-03-11 10:30:00' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE website_traffic SET visit_timestamp = '2021-10-05 10:30:00', visitor_id = 1234 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate = 23.75, conversion_timestamp = '2021-10-05 11:45:00' WHERE page_url = '/checkout';
UPDATE website_traffic SET exit_time = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rate SET total_visits = total_visits + 1, conversion_count = conversion_count + 1 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE website_traffic SET entry_time = '2022-07-15 08:30:00', exit_time = '2022-07-15 17:45:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rate SET conversion_count = 25, total_visits = 1000, conversion_rate = 2.50 WHERE page_url = '/product123';
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited = 'Home Page' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_results SET conversion_date = '2021-08-15' WHERE result_id = 5;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_results SET conversion_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE result_id = 3 AND strategy_id = 2;
UPDATE visitors SET conversion = TRUE WHERE visitor_id = 1234;
UPDATE pages SET total_visits = total_visits + 1 WHERE page_id = 5;
UPDATE visitors SET page_visited = 'Homepage', conversion = TRUE WHERE visitor_id = 1001;
UPDATE pages SET total_visits = total_visits + 1, unique_visitors = unique_visitors + 1 WHERE page_name = 'Product Page';
